dashboard
{boxes showing attendance(in,out,active,absent,leave),percentages
piechart(showing the same in a circle),
barchart over last week
left sidebar link to other pages(by depot,month,week,employee...),
header with name ,login page
}

details page
{search bar,sort(dropdown),filters(depot,date,month,type of emp,)
table(with changeable columns)
}
login page{
header with dashboard link,
username,password,sign in,

}
